pullrequest.title: Fix #2089: Incorrect model visual and collision bounding box

content.raw:
Nice catch! I ticketed an [issue](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/issues/53/possible-to-end-up-with-a-finite-box-with) about this on ignition math.

I think it should be possible to add a test for this similar to [INTEGRATION_physics_collision::GetBoundingBox](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/89141df0af77ac2b921fad32368416a222403516/test/integration/physics_collision.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#physics_collision.cc-43), but for a model with many links, where each link has many collisions.
